content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup at (-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position -28.0, -61.0)
- Wooden chest (position -27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter (position -26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace (position -25.0, -59.0)
- Burner inserter (position -23.5, -58.5)
- Output chest (position -22.5, -58.5) containing iron plates

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup at (-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -53.0)
- Wooden chest (position -17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter (position -16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace (position -15.0, -51.0)
- Burner inserter (position -13.5, -50.5)
- Output chest (position -12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates

### Coal Mining Setup at (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position 41.0, -82.0)
- Output chest (position 41.5, -80.5)
- Burner inserter (position 41.5, -79.5)

### Power Generation Setup at (-4.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (position -4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler (position -4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump (position -3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe groups (fluid systems 7160, 7161, 7168, 7169, 7172)
- Electricity network (id 12654) connecting various poles

### Science Pack Production Setup at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position 8.5, 13.5)
- Input chest (position 5.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter (position 6.5, 13.5)
- Output chest (position 11.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter (position 10.5, 13.5)
- Connected by belt groups for material transport

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing lab
- Ensure the target location (8.5, y) is clear of other entities before attempting to place the lab
- Scout alternative locations if current position is blocked

### Errors with coal fuel management
- Maintain coal supply in inventory before attempting to fuel machines
- Check coal storage chests are properly filled before attempting extraction
- Implement a coal supply monitoring system to prevent machines running out of fuel

### Errors with entity retrieval
- Verify entity exists at target position before attempting to interact with it
- Double check coordinates when trying to get entities
- Consider implementing position verification before entity operations

### Errors with item insertion/extraction
- Verify required items exist in inventory before insertion attempts
- Ensure target containers contain expected items before extraction
- Implement inventory checks before item operations

### Power system issues
- Keep boilers fueled to maintain consistent power
- Monitor coal levels in power generation system
- Consider implementing automated fuel delivery system
